data.decision: Pivot Duro focus to code and dev tooling - deprioritize media production workflows
data.rationale: Media production (Fashanus) abandoned due to quality/cost issues with free AI tools. Code and dev tooling is more immediately valuable and doesn't depend on external AI quality improvements.
alternatives: Continue media focus with paid tools
Split focus between code and media
data.context: Following decision to abandon Fashanus. Phase 4.4 will now target code project pipelines instead of video production.
